author: chfast
content:
According to the [Gas Cost Estimator](https://github.com/imapp-pl/gas-cost-estimator/blob/master/docs/gas-cost-estimator.md#alternative-gas-cost-schedule) report the `JUMP` and `JUMPI` are significantly overpriced
in relation to other instructions.

In Geth:
- the `JUMP` (8) has the performance similar to `PUSH` (3) and `SLT` (3),
- the `JUMPI` has the performance similar to `SHL` (3), `MUL` (5) and `MSTORE8` (3).

In evmone the cost of `JUMP` and `JUMPI` is minimal (in the group of best performing instructions).
